info.title: BeezUP API
info.description: This is the RESTful API of BeezUP which allows you to manage everything related to BeezUP

tags.name: Auto
tags.description: All operations related to the Auto importation

tags.name: Global
tags.description: All operations related to global information

tags.name: Importation Process
tags.description: All operations concerning the importation process

tags.name: Importation Catalog Info
tags.description: All operations related to the catalog information during the importation

tags.name: Catalog
tags.description: All operation related to the catalog

tags.name: Rules
tags.description: All rules operations. Rules are automatic optimisations based on report filters.

tags.name: Marketplaces - Channel catalogs - Global
tags.description: Operations to fetch your marketplace account related to your channel catalogs

tags.name: Marketplaces - Channel catalogs - Publications
tags.description: Operations to fetch your marketplace account's catalog publication history

tags.name: Marketplaces - Channel catalogs - Settings
tags.description: Operations to manage your channel catalogs' marketplace settings

tags.name: Order
tags.description: All operations related to a single Order

tags.name: Batches
tags.description: All batch operations on Orders to reduce call rate

Location.description: The location of the new resource to poll

Retry-After.description: The duration in second to wait before polling this resource

importAlreadyInProgress.description: When a catalog importation is already in progress!

links.description: contains the link to the current importation. rel=currentImportation

processingResponse.description: The marketplace configuration related to this channel catalog is currently in progress. Please retry later.

Retry-After.description: Indicate the duration to before the next retry in second.

executionId.name: executionId
executionId.description: The execution identifier of you catalog importation

productSampleIndex.name: productSampleIndex
productSampleIndex.description: Index of the product sample. Starting from 0 to 99.

userNameInQueryParameter.name: userName
userNameInQueryParameter.description: Sometimes the user in the e-commerce application is not the same as user associated with the current subscription key. We recommend providing your application's user login.

testModeInQueryParameter.name: testMode
testModeInQueryParameter.description: If true, the operation will be not be sent to marketplace. But the validation will be taken in account.

200.description: Channel catalog exclusion filter operator list

parameters.description: The channel catalog product list filter

delete.summary: Delete a specific channel catalog product value override

parameters.name: channelColumnId
parameters.description: The channel column identifier

204.description: Channel catalog product value override deleted

post.description:
By default a all your catalog products are exposed to the channel.
You can disable a product by using this operation.
/!\ In case of massive optimisation we recommand you to use the analytics api

By default a all your catalog products are exposed to the channel.
You can reenable a product by using this operation.
/!\ In case of massive optimisation we recommand you to use the analytics api

get.summary: Display the synchronization status of the clicks and orders
get.description:
Your clicks and orders are eventually consistent. \
This operation indicates you at which date the projections are.

post.description:
/!\ WARNING /!\ \
Apply the operation on every product related to this request. \
This operation is used at the bottom of the analytics page result.

/!\ WARNING /!\ \
This operation will reenable or disable this product for every channel indicated in the body.

post.description: Get the offer pricing then you can create your contract with the same request parameters. /v2/user/customer/contracts

200.description: Get the offer proposal considering your current contract

400.description: Bad request. (Invalid billing period, invalid offer, etc.)

403.description: You current contract is not modifiable. Please choose another offer.

post.description: Now you are ready to create your contract. Before that, please ensure that you check the offer with the same request parameterts. /offers

200.description: New contract has been saved. Some warnings can be present in response.

400.description: Bad request. (Invalid billing period, invalid offer, etc.)

403.description: The contract is not modifiable or the coupon offer has been already used

409.description: The contract is not modifiable or the coupon offer has been already used

post.summary: Schedule termination of your current contract at the end of the commitment.
post.description: By default your contract are automatically renew. By calling this operation you can disable the auto renewal.

parameters.name: request
parameters.description: Indicate the termination reason

204.description: Your current contract termination has been scheduled

400.description: Invalid reason type

404.description: No current contract

post.description: By calling this operation you can re-enable the auto renewal.

204.description: Your current contract has been resumed

404.description: No current contract

post.summary: Get a paginated list of all Orders with all Order and Order Item(s) properties
post.description:
The purpose of this operation is to reduce the amount of request to the API.\
\
Previous implmentation of this feature only returned a partial (light) version of the Orders. The purpose of this API is to reduce the number of incoming requests by returning the complete (full) Order and Order Item(s) properties.

parameters.name: Accept-Encoding
parameters.description: Allows the client to indicate wether it accepts a compressed encoding to reduce traffic size

200.description: Successfully fetched the full list of Orders

post.summary: Get a paginated list of all Orders without details

200.description: Successfully fetched the list of Orders

parameters.description: The store identifier to regroup the order exportations

200.description: Successfully fetched the list of Order report exportations

ETag value to identify the last known version of requested Order\

ETag.description:
ETag value to identify the current version of requested Order\
For more details go to this link: http://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc7232#section-2.3

ETag value to identify the current version of requested Order\

post.summary: Change your marketplace Order Information (accept, ship, etc.)

parameters.name: If-Match
parameters.description:
ETag value to identify the last known version of requested Order, to ensure that you are making a change on the lastest version of the order.\
For more details go to this link: http://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc7232#section-2.3

400.description: Could not send Order change request to marketplace. Please see body for more information.

404.description: Requested Order could not be found

409.description: Already processing a change request for this Order. Please refresh your clients Order information and retry later.

Retry-After.description: Indicates the duration in seconds to wait to be able to make this request again

412.description: Last known version of Order does not match current version. Please refresh your client's Order information.

ETag.description:
The ETag value to identify the order.\
For more details go to this link: http://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc7232#section-2.3

get.summary: The channel list regrouped by country
The channel list for one country

parameters.name: countryIsoCode
parameters.description:
The country iso code alpha 3 based on this: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_3166-1_alpha-3#Decoding_table \
To know which country are available you have to use the operation: GetChannelsByCountry

parameters.name: Accept-Encoding
parameters.description: Allows the client to indicate wether it accepts a compressed encoding to reduce traffic size.

200.description: The channel list for one country

404.description: Channel country not found

post.description: User Login - The login will give your tokens

400.description: Bad Request

post.description: User Registration - Create a new user on BeezUP

400.description: Email or password is invalid. Disposable email are refused.

409.description: Email already used

post.description: Lost password - Your password will be regenerated and sent to your email

parameters.name: email
parameters.description: Your email

400.description: Bad Request

404.description: Email not found

schedulingType.description: Indicate the scheduling type. Schedule or Interval. We recommand you to use interval for a better reporting.

duplicateProductValueStrategy.description: Indicate the duplicate product sku strategy.

compareOptions.description: Indicate how the product sku are compared for the duplication check.

schedulingValue.description: Indicate the scheduling value. If the scheduling type is Interval then the value will be a duration otherwise the values will be the time.

paused.description: Indicate if the auto import is in pause or not.

pauseStatusChangedUtcDate.description: Indicate when the pause status has changed in UTC date.

schedulingLocalTimeZoneName.description: Indicate the time zone name of the scheduling. If the scheduling type is "Schedule"

transformFileUrl.description: Can be null. Use to transform multiple files with an XSLT file.

files.description: The list of files to get and read

inputFileConfiguration.description: Describe how to get and read a file

downloadCatalogStrategy.description: Indicate the download strategy (simple uri, ftps, ftplatest file, etc...)

inputFileFetchConfiguration.description: Describe the way to download the file

uri.description: Indicate the Uri of the file. (http, https, ftp, ftps, sftp are allowed)

compressedRelativePath.description: Indicate the relative path in the compressed file

downloadTimeout.description: Indicate the download time out in second

inputFileReadConfiguration.description: Describe how to read the file. If FileFormatStrategy is CSV, csvFileReadProperties is required. Otherwise the xmlFileReadProperties is required.

encodingTypeName.description: The encoding type. UTF-8 by default.

cultureName.description: The culture name of the file.  (i.e. fr-FR). If null then Invariant culture will be used.

hasHeaderRecord.description: Indicate if the csv file contains the column name at the first row

ignoreHeaderRecord.description: Indicate if the importation should not use the csv column name from the file

csvSeparator.description: Indicate the separator of the values in the CSV file. Generally ";"

csvTextQualifier.description: Indicate the text qualifier of the CSV file. Generally the value is "

useXmlAttributes.description: Indicate if the importation should take in account the attribute in the xml nodes.

flattenXmlChildElements.description: Indicate if the children xml nodes should be flatten with there parent to take in account the sub node values.

configureAutoImportIntervalRequest.description: The message request to configure the auto import interval

interval.description: Indicate the interval in time span. (i.e. "04:00:00" for every 4 hours)

scheduleAutoImportRequest.description: The message request to schedule the auto import

schedules.description: Indicate the time span you want to import your catalog. (i.e. "21:00:00" to import your catalog at 9PM)

localTimeZoneName.description: If null the local time zone name will be "Romance Standard Time"

displayGroupName.description: Indicate the display group name where the column must be putted

canBeTruncated.description: If the size of the value is greater than the limit we can truncate the value instead of failing...

unique.description:
/!\ ONLY AVAILABLE ON CATALOG COLUMN NOT ON CUSTOM COLUMNS!!
If true, an error happen at the second occurence of the same value for this column
This information will be used during the importation process and later for mapping proposal

description.example: Use for big text, like description

changeUserColumnNameRequest.description: The message request for the change user column name

encryptedExpression.description: The encrypted excel expression of the column

encryptedBlocklyExpression.description: The encrypted XML Blockly representation of the expression

createCustomColumnRequest.description: The request message to create a custom column

changeCustomColumnExpressionRequest.description: The request message to change the custom column expression

computeExpressionRequest.description: The request message to compute an expression based on the provided product values

executionId.description: The execution identifier of the catalog importation

importationMonitoring.description: Describe the reporting of the catalog importation

success.description: Indicates if the importation was successfully completed or not

lastUpdateUtcDate.description: The last update of the reporting

beginUtcDate.description: The start date of the importation

errors.description: In case of error a description will be indicated

steps.description: Contains all steps of the importation process with a boolean. If true the step has been passed, false the step is not complete

detectedCatalogColumns.description: The list of detected catalog column

allOf.description: The catalog column detected during the first parsing step

detected.description: Indicates if the column is detected or is from the current catalog

existingCatalogColumnConfiguration.description: In case your catalog column already exists we indicate you the existing configuration.

productValues.description: The key is the column identifier

configureCatalogColumnCatalogRequest.description: The request to configure a catalog column

ignored.description: IF true, the product values of this column will be not taken in account during the importation process

columnConfiguration.description: Indicates the configuration applied on the column (catalog or custom) during the importation process.

columnCultureName.description: If non null, culture used to parse the value to the storage type of this column\r\n will be used for parsing and for consolidation proces

columnFormat.description: If non null, format used to parse the value to the storage type of this column\r\n will be used for parsing and for consolidation proces

stepName.description: The last step name of the importation process

success.description: Indicate if the importation succeed or not.

totalProductCount.description: Indicate the total product count detected in the catalog during the importation.

totalProductErrorCount.description: Indicate the total product count in error detected in the catalog during the importation.

totalProductSuccessCount.description: Indicate the total product count in success in the catalog during the importation.

errors.description: Indicate the error message list related to this importation.

lastUpdateUtcDate.description: Indicate the last update UTC date of the reporting.

autoImported.description: Indicate if this importation is an auto import or not.

beginUtcDate.description: Indicate the begin UTC date of this importation.

endUtcDate.description: Indicate the end UTC date of this importation.

inputConfigurationUrl.description: Indicate the input url of this importation.

steps.description: Indicate the steps that have been passed during the importation process

startManualImportRequest.description: The message request start a manual importation process.  Indicate the way to handle duplicate product. Can be null if you want to reuse the configuration of the previous importation succeed.

stepsProgression.description: Indicate for each step of the importation the uris to look at

changeCustomColumnRequest.description: The message request to change a custom column expression an user name

getProductsRequest.description: The request message to get products based on these filters

sku.description: Search for products containing this SKU (merchant product dentifier).

title.description: Search for products containing this title

categories.description: The object which contains the category list

links.description: Indicates how to create a channel catalog and how to get the channel catalog list

generalSettings.description: Represents the general settings of your channel catalog

acceptToPublishInfo.description: If true then you authorize disclosure of my statistics generated from clicks and sales

noCategoryMapping.description: Indicates that the channel authorize you to do not map your categories with their categories

doNotExportOutOfStockProducts.description: Do not export "out of stock" products. Note: this option is not taken into account by the counter.

activeBeezUPTracking.description: Activate BeezUP tracking for my statistics (checked by default)

costType.description:
CPC means cost per click.
CPA means cost per action.
You can have CPC/CPA with a global cost value.
You can have CPC/CPA by category the cost value MUST be null
You can have global fixed price.

costSettings.description: Depending to the cost type you will have to define a cost value.

globalCostValue.description: In case of global cost type, you have to indicate the cost value.

unmapCategoryRequest.description: The request message to unmap a catalog category path to a channel category path

mapCategoryRequest.description: The request message to make a mapping between catalog category path and a channel category path

overrideSubCategoryMappings.description: Great feature! In case of mapping to parent channel category, you can ask to override the mapping of all sub channel category to this catalog category path

autoMapNewSubCategories.description: Great feature! In case of mapping to parent catalog category, you can ask to automatically map new sub catalog category in the next importation to this channel category path.

channelCatalogCategoryMapping.description:
Represent a mapping between a catalog category path and a channel category path. 
The cost on this mapping can be applied.

costValue.description: In case of CPC_ByCategory or CPA_ByCategory cost type, you have to indicate the cost value.

columnMapping.description: Represent a mapping between a channel column considering channel category mapping and a catalog column

upgradeOfferRequired.description: The message contains the offer identifier required to execute this operation

columnMappingWithNameList.description: The column mapping list between a channel and a catalog

columnMappingList.description: The column mapping list between a channel and a catalog

categoryMappingState.description: The category mapping state of the channel catalog

categorizedWithoutCostProductCount.description: Indicates the categorized product count without cost defined on the category

productCount.description: The product count exported considering category mapping. Not all filters have been applied.

enabled.description: Indicates if the channel catalog is active

isMarketplace.description: Indicates if this channel catalog is related to a marketplace

links.description: Indicates the actions you can do on a channel catalog

productOverrides.description: The key is the channel column identifier

productOverridesWithCatalogValues.description: The key is the channel column identifier

position.description: The position of the exclusion filter

groupId.description: Indicate the filter's group. All filters in the same group means an "AND" operation in the filter group

positionInGroup.description: Indicate the filter group position. This information is used for the UI purpose and must be unique in the filter group.

value.description: The value indicate by the user when the filter operation requires it.

sku.description: Search by product sku. If null the filter will not be taken in account.

title.description: Search by product title. If null the filter will not be taken in account.

overrided.description: Search overrided products. If null the filter will not be taken in account.

disabled.description: Search disabled products. If null the filter will not be taken in account.

categoryMapped.description: Search product with category mapped with the channel. If null the filter will not be taken in account.

excluded.description: Search excluded products by at least an exclusion filter. If null the filter will not be taken in account.

active.description: If false, search for product absent from the current catalog. If null the filter will not be taken in account.

channelCatalogProductInfoList.description: The channel catalog product info list

disabled.description: Indicates if the product has been disabled or not

categoryMapped.description: Indicates if the product's category has been mapped to a channel category

excluded.description: Indicates if the product has been excluded by a exclusion filter

channelCatalogProductInfoLinks.description: Indicates the differents actions you can do on a channel product

productStateFilter.description: You can filter on the product state.

reportProductFilter.description: Describe a filter on a product's column

columnId.description: The column identifier of your catalog or a custom column.

values.description: Must be null if the operator is "IsNull" or "IsNotNull". Can contains multiple value in case of "InList" operator. Otherwise a single value is expected.

reportProductFilterOperatorName.description: Indicate the operator you want to make on the columnId

beginPeriodUtcDate.description: The begin date period you want to get the report

endPeriodUtcDate.description: The end date period you want to get the report.

pageSize.description: Indicate the item count per page

reportIndicatorFilterOperatorName.description: Indicates the operator you want to apply on this indicator

value.description: Indicates the filter value to apply on this indicator

categoryPath.description: Indicates on which category path you want to make the filter

performanceIndicatorType.description: Indicate on which indicator or value you want to make your formula

beginPeriodUtcDate.description: The begin date period you want to get the report

endPeriodUtcDate.description: The end date period you want to get the report.

globalMarginPercent.description: If the margin type is 'Global', indicate the percentage of sale price.

linkClickToOrderMaxDay.description: If the linkOrderType is OnClickDate, indicate the max day to search the click from the order

onlyPaymentValidatedOrders.description: If true, you will get the only the orders with payment validated. Otherwise, you will get all orders validated or not.

onlyDirectSales.description: If true, you will get only direct sales. Otherwise the indirect sales will be included.

globalPerformanceIndicator.description: Indicates the global performance indicator for this channel

enabledOnChannelCount.description: The count of channel where this product is enabled

channelCount.description: The channel count where this product can be enabled

clickCount.description: The click count for this product

orderCount.description: The order count for this product

performanceIndicator.description: The performance indicator based on the performance indicator formula indicated in the request for this product

enabledProductCount.description: The enabled product count for this category

catalogProductCount.description: The catalog product count related to this category

clickCount.description: The click count for this category

orderCount.description: The order count for this category

performanceIndicator.description: The performance indicator based on the performance indicator formula indicated in the request for this category

enabledProductCount.description: The enabled product count for this channel

catalogProductCount.description: The catalog product count for this channel

clickCount.description: The click count for this channel

orderCount.description: The order count for this channel

performanceIndicator.description: The performance indicator based on the performance indicator formula indicated in the request for this channel

orderCount.description: The order count for this channel

performanceIndicator.description: The performance indicator based on the performance indicator formula indicated in the request for this channel

thirdParameter.description: Indicate the value of the third parameter of your formula

performanceIndicatorFormulaParameterType.description: Indicate on which indicator or value you want to make your formula

utcDate.description: The utc date of the click

ipAddress.description: The user's IP address related to this click

utcDate.description: The utc date of the order.

totalAmount.description: The total amount related to the order.

paymentValidated.description: Indicate if the payment of this order has been validated or not.

products.description: the product list related to this order.

unitPrice.description: The product's unit price related to this order

margin.description: Indicate the product's margin related to this order.

utcDate.description: The utc date of the external order.

visitorId.description: Can be null. The visitor identifier related to this external order

totalAmount.description: The total amount related to the external order.

paymentValidated.description: Indicate if the payment of this external order has been validated or not.

products.description: Can be null. the product list related to this external order.

productSku.description: The product sku received related to the external order.

productTitle.description: We tried to get the catalog product title based on the product SKU. This property can be null, if we cannot found the product. This is possible if the product is not referenced in the imported catalog.

productImageUrl.description: We tried to get the catalog product image Url based on the product SKU. This property can be null, if we cannot found the product. This is possible if the product is not referenced in the imported catalog.

productActive.description: We tried to get the catalog product if it's still active based on the product SKU. This property can be null, if we cannot found the product. This is possible if the product is not referenced in the imported catalog.

productId.description: We tried to get the catalog product identifier based on the product SKU. This property can be null, if we cannot found the product. This is possible if the product is not referenced in the imported catalog.

unitPrice.description: The product's unit price related to this external order. This property is voluntarily a string because the value could be an invalid one.

quantity.description: Indicate the product's quantity ordered. This property is voluntarily a string because the value could be an invalid one

margin.description: Indicate the product's margin related to this order. This property is voluntarily a string because the value could be an invalid one

clickSynchronizationUtcDate.description: The utc date of the latest click synchronized

orderSynchonizationUtcDate.description: The utc date of the latest order synchronized

marketplaceOrderSynchonizationUtcDate.description: The utc date of the latest marketplace order synchronized

orderSynchonizationUtcDate.description: The utc date of the latest order synchronized

marketplaceOrderSynchonizationUtcDate.description: The utc date of the latest marketplace order synchronized

reportFilterLinks.description: Indicates the actions you can do on this report filter

ruleListLinks.description: Links to know if the user can create a rule or run all rules

ruleLastExecutionStatus.description: The status of the last execution

ruleLinks.description: Links to retrieve/action on other entities

lastExecutionUtcDate.description: The utc date of the last execution

reportFilterId.description: Report filter identifier linked to the rule
The report filter to use for the rule

startUtcDate.description: The start validity utc date of the rule

endUtcDate.description: The end validity utc date of the rule

updateRuleRequest.description: This update will replace the following values.

startUtcDate.description: Not required. The start validity utc date of the rule.

endUtcDate.description: Not required. The end validity utc date of the rule

ruleExecutionReportingStatus.description: The status of the execution of the rule

ruleExecutionReportingErrorType.description: The error type for this execution if any

ruleExecutionReportingExecutionSource.description: The requestor type for the execution of the rule

ruleExecutionReportingLinks.description: Links to retrieve/action on this rule execution

startedUtcDate.description: The start utc date of the execution of the rule

completedUtcDate.description: The completed utc date of the execution of the rule

affectedProductCount.description: The count of affected products, active or not

activeAffectedProductCount.description: The count of affected active products

affectedChannelCount.description: The count of affected Channels across all products

userId.description: The userId that executed the rule if any

reportUrl.description: The url for the excel report for this execution

descriptionAvailable.description: Indicates if we have more detailed information about this channel

isMarketplace.description: Indicates if the channel is a marketplace

channelHeaderLinks.description: The links related to an available channel

channelDescription.description: Indicae a description to the channel
channelDescription.example: Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipisicing elit. Mollitia dolorum, animi voluptatibus maiores, assumenda maxime illum, labore quae quas ducimus laudantium provident veritatis doloremque dignissimos eum. Error magni illum autem.

costs.description: The cost's description of the channel

businessModel.description: The business model of the channel

homeUrl.description: The home url of the channel

subscriptionLink.description: The subscription link to the channel

products.description: The estimated product count of the channel

categories.description: The estimated category count of the channel

stores.description: The estimated store count of the channel

viewsPerMonth.description: The estimated view count per month of the channel

channelCategoryDefaultCost.description: The default cost on this channel category

channelCategoryChannelCode.description: The channel category channel code identifier

channelCategoryLevel.description: The channel category level starting from 1

channelRootCategory.description: Get channel first level category list

channelFirstLevelCategory.description: The first level category with his sub categories

channelColumnDescription.example: Please enter the base prices (price per unit) according to Article PAngV

channelColumnShowInMapping.description: Indicates if this column must shown in the mapping page or not

position.description: The position of the column starting from 1

channelColumnRestrictedValues.description: The restricted values. The key will be the restricted value identifier (format:guid) and the value will be the restriced value

channelColumnConfiguration.description: The channel column configuration. The BeezUP Column Name is optional. If the BeezUP column is mapped we will indicate the data type and column importance of the BeezUP column.

links.description: The different actions you can make on this share

storeUserRole.description:
Indicates the role can have a user on a store. 
* Owner: Indicates that you are the owner of this store
* User: Indicates that you are a simple user on this store

storeStatus.description:
The store status
* Active:  When the store is active
* SystemBlocked:  When the store is blocked by the system
* UserBlocked: When the store is blocked on GO not on the system

accountStatus.description:
The account status
* Active:  When the account is active
* SystemBlocked:  When all stores on the account are blocked by the system
* UserBlocked: When all stores on the account are blocked on GO not on the system
* NotActivated: When the email is not verified

ownerUserId.description: The user id of the owner of the store

shareCount.description: The share count related to this store

creationUtcDate.description: The creation date of the store

links.description: The action links for this store

storeName.description: The store name. Must be unique.

storeCountryIsoCodeAlpha3.description: The country iso code alpha 3 based on the list of values /user/lov/StoreCountry

storeSectors.description: The store's sectors based on the list of values /user/lov/ParamSector

storeSector.description: The store's sector based on the list of values /user/lov/ParamSector

functionalityRightInfo.description: Describe the rights for a functionality

maxValueInterger.description: The max value for this functionality code considering your rights

unlimited.description: If you can use this functionality unlimitedly

amountToBePaid.description: The remaining amount to be paid for this invoice

invoiceUrl.description: The url of the invoice document

friendCountryIsoCodeAlpha3.description: Your friend's user country iso code alpha 3

friendProfilePictureUrl.description: Your friend's user profile picture url

whatIDo.description: Your friend's user occupation in his company

allOf.description: Get the conditions of your current contract
Get the conditions of your next contract

contractInfo.description: Describe the conditions of a contract

billingPeriodPercentDiscount.description: The percent discount related to the billing period

startUtcDate.description: The start date of your contract

commitmentCalculatedFinishUtcDate.description: The calculated end date of commitment

fixedPrice.description: The fixed price of your contract

ipUserCreation.description: The IP of the user who creates the contract

ipUserModification.description: The IP of the user who modified the contract

variablePrice.description: The pricing applied for this range

offerId.description: The offer id based on /offers. Not a free offer of course.

storeCount.description: The store count you want to have in your contract.

billingPeriodInMonth.description: Can be null. The billing period in month based on /billingperiods

contractTerminationReasonType.description: The contract termination reason type identifier, if your current contract is scheduled to be terminated. The value is based on the list of values /user/lov/ContractTerminationReason

contractTerminationReason.description: The termination reason, if your current contract is scheduled to be terminated.
contractTerminationReason.example: I'm crazy, I want to leave your splendid service...

publishedItems.description: The item count (products or offers) the marketplace flagged as successful

publishedItemsWithWarning.description: The item count (products or offers) the marketplace flagged as successful with warnings

failedItems.description: The item count (products or offers) the marketplace flagged as failed

htmlReportUrl.description: The Url for the Html Report generated

htmlReportGenerationErrorMessage.description: The error message if the Html Report generation failed

completed.description: Indicates if the publication is completed or not

properties.name: RetrieveOnlyOneCountry
properties.description: If true allows to retireve one marketplace country only

displayGroupCode.description: Indicate the code identifier of the group

displayGroupPosition.description: Indicate the position of the group

allOf.description: Model for fetching a channel catalog marketplace property

default.description: Indicate the default values of the property

description.description: Indicate the description of the property
description.example: If true allows to retireve one marketplace country only

position.description: Indicate the position of the property in the display group

readOnly.description: Indicate if the value cannot be changed. This is used for example for ebay token that should not be changed.

minLength.description: Indicates the minimum size of the property value

maxLength.description: Indicates the maximum size of the property value

minItems.description: Indicates the minimum item count of the property value.

maxItems.description: Indicates the maximum item count of the property value

lovRequired.description: Indicates if the property value must be in the list of value.

required.description: Indicate if the property is required or not

offerIdRequired.description: Indicates the offer identifier required to configure this property.

visible.description: Indicates if this property should be displayed in the configuration page.

pattern.description: Channel catalog marketplace setting value format validation regular expression

setChannelCatalogMarketplaceSettingsRequ.description: The channel catalog marketplace settings to save

channelCatalogMarketplaceSetting.description: Model for fetching a channel catalog marketplace setting

marketplaceChannelCatalogs.description: The list of marketplace channel catalog

marketplaceChannelCatalog.description: This object indicates you the association between a channel catalog and a marketplace. The account identifier will be automatically defined based on your marketplace merchant identfier.

marketplaceMarketPlaceId.description: The marketplace identifier in the marketplace

marketplaceIsoCountryCodeAlpha2.description: The marketplace country iso code alpha 2 (see http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_3166-1_alpha-2#Decoding_table for more details)

marketplaceChannelCatalogLovLinks.description: Indicates the List Of Values related to the marketplace

marketplaceChannelCatalogLinks.description: Indicate the actions you can do on a channel catalog. If the settings are valid, you will be able to access to the publication history.

marketplaceTechnicalCode.description: The technical code of the marketplace

accountId.description: The marketplace account identifier in BeezUP. This account identifier is based on your api settings.

order_MerchantECommerceSoftwareName.description: The e-commerce software name of the merchant

order_MerchantECommerceSoftwareVersion.description: The e-commece software version of the merchant

orderExportations.description: The list of Order report exportations

orderExportationReporting.description: Represent the reporting of the Order report exportations

dateSearchType.description: Indicates on which date you want to make the filter

beginPeriodUtcDate.description: The begin period you want to make the search. The period MUST not be greater than 30 days. If null, the current date minus 30 days will be used.

endPeriodUtcDate.description: The end period of you search. The period MUST not be greater than 30 days. If null the current date will be used.

exportOrderListRequest.description: The message request to export order list. The store identifier is requested to regroup the exportations.

processing.description: If true, there is currently a harvest or an order change in progress. Otherwise false.

orderHeader.description: Describe the basic information related to an order. All properties with the prefix order_ are translated in the list of values /user/lov/OrderMetaInfoOrderDetails

order_PurchaseUtcDate.description: The purchase date of this order

order_LastModificationUtcDate.description: The last modification UTC date done by BeezUP of this order

order_MarketplaceLastModificationUtcDate.description: The last modification UTC date done by the marketplace on this order

order_TotalPrice.description: The total price of this order (corresponding to the amount paid by the customer)

etag.description:
ETag value to identify the order.\
This information is required for the operation GetOrder and ChangeOrder.\
For more details go to this link: http://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc7232#section-2.3

orderItem.description: Describe an order item. All properties with the prefix orderItem_ are translated in the list of values /user/lov/OrderMetaInfoOrderItems

beezUPOrderItemId.description: The BeezUP identifier of the order Item

orderItem_OrderItemType.description: The order item type of the order item

orderItem_MerchantImportedProductId.description: The product id indicated in the catalog importation in BeezUP system for this order item. This property will help you to match the order to the inventory system.

orderItem_MerchantImportedProductIdColum.description: The column name for the product id indicated in the catalog importation in BeezUP system related to this order item. This property will help you to match the order to the inventory system.

orderItem_MerchantImportedProductUrl.description: The product url indicated in the catalog importation in BeezUP system related to this order item

orderItem_MerchantProductIdColumnName.description: The column name indicate in the mapping for the product id related to the order item

orderItem_BeezUPStoreId.description: The store id in the beezup system related to the order item. This property will help you to match the order to the inventory system.

orderItem_ItemTax.description: The tax of the order item

orderItem_Title.description: The title of the order item

orderItem_ImageUrl.description: The URL of the image of the order item

orderItem_MerchantProductId.description: The merchant product id of the order item

orderItem_MarketPlaceProductId.description: The marketplace product identifier of the order item

orderItem_ItemPrice.description: The price of the order item

orderItem_Quantity.description: The quantity of the order item

orderItem_TotalPrice.description: The total price of the order item

orderItem_Shipping_Price.description: The shipping price of the order item

allOf.description: Describe in details all informations related to an order. All properties with the prefix order_ are translated in the list of values /user/lov/OrderMetaInfoOrderDetails.

order_MarketPlaceChannel.description: Useful to identify the origin of the order. For example in Amazon.

order_TotalTax.description: The total tax of this order

order_TotalCommission.description: The total commission of this order

order_PaymentMethod.description: The payment method of this order

order_PayingUtcDate.description: The UTC date of the payment of this order

order_Comment.description: The comment associated to this order

order_Shipping_Civility.description: The civility of the person in the shipping address for this order

order_Shipping_CompanyName.description: The company name of the shipping address for this order

order_Shipping_AddressName.description: The name of the person in the shipping address for this order

order_Shipping_Email.description: The email of the person in the shipping address for this order

order_Shipping_AddressLine1.description: The shipping address line 1 of this order

order_Shipping_AddressLine2.description: The shipping address line 2 of this order

order_Shipping_AddressLine3.description: The shipping address line 3 of this order

order_Shipping_AddressPostalCode.description: The shipping address postal code of this order

order_Shipping_AddressCity.description: The shipping address city of this order

order_Shipping_AddressStateOrRegion.description: The shipping address state or region of this order

order_Shipping_AddressCountryIsoCodeAlph.description: The shipping address country iso code alpha 2 (see http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_3166-1_alpha-2#Decoding_table for more details)

order_Shipping_Phone.description: The phone number of the person in the shipping address for this order

order_Shipping_MobilePhone.description: The mobile phone number of the person in the shipping address for this order

order_Shipping_Price.description: The shipping price of this order

order_Shipping_Method.description: The shipping method of this order

order_Shipping_ShippingTax.description: The shipping tax for this order

order_Shipping_EarliestShipUtcDate.description: The UTC date of the earliest ship for this order

order_Shipping_LatestShipUtcDate.description: The UTC date of the latest ship for this order

order_Buyer_Identifier.description: The buyer identifier for this order

order_Buyer_Civility.description: The buyer civility for this order

order_Buyer_CompanyName.description: The buyer company name for this order

order_Buyer_Email.description: The email of the buyer for this order

order_Buyer_AddressLine1.description: The Buyer address line 1 of this order

order_Buyer_AddressLine2.description: The Buyer address line 2 of this order

order_Buyer_AddressLine3.description: The Buyer address line 3 of this order

order_Buyer_AddressPostalCode.description: The Buyer address postal code of this order

order_Buyer_AddressCity.description: The Buyer address city of this order

order_Buyer_AddressStateOrRegion.description: The Buyer address state or region of this order

order_Buyer_AddressCountryIsoCodeAlpha2.description: The Buyer address country iso code alpha 2 (see http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_3166-1_alpha-2#Decoding_table for more details)

order_Buyer_Phone.description: The phone number of the buyer for this order

order_Buyer_MobilePhone.description: The mobile phone number of the buyer for this order

order_OrderSourceUri.description: Technical information: The url to the source of this order. We received this information from the marketplace.

order_OrderItemsSourceUri.description: Technical information: The url to the source of this order items. We received this information from the marketplace.

orderTransitionLinks.description: Contains the authorized change actions for an order

marketplaceBusinessCode.description: In an marketplace technical code like CDiscount you can have several marketplaces like GO SPORT, etc. We identify them by a business code.

beezUPOrderStatus.description: BeezUP order status. Unified for all marketplaces.

orderHistory.description: Describe the history related to an order

changeOrderReportings.description: The list of change order operation

sourceType.description: Indicates the origin of the operation

changeOrderReporting.description: The reporting related to a change order operation

creationUtcDate.description: The creation UTC date of the execution

processingStatus.description: The processing status of the execution

lastUpdateUtcDate.description: The last update UTC date of the execution

errorMessage.description: The error message during the execution

ipAddress.description: The IP address who request this operation

harvestOrderReporting.description: The reporting related to a harvest order operation

creationUtcDate.description: The creation UTC date of the execution

processingStatus.description: The processing status of the execution

lastUpdateUtcDate.description: The last update UTC date of the execution

errorMessage.description: The warning message during the execution

warningMessage.description: The warning message during the execution

beezUPForcedStatus.description: The marketplace order status forced by BeezUP during the order change oepration. This could happend when there is no status on the marketplace side.

changeOrderListRequest.description: Contains all change order operations you want to make

changeOrderListRequestItem.description: Contains the order identifier and the change order request

changeOrderRequest.description: All properties with the prefix order_ are translated in the list of values /user/lov#OrderMetaInfoPosted

batchOrderOperationResponse.description: The response given by the batch operation

orderOperationResponse.description: The response given by the batch operation for an order

success.description: Indicates if the operation succeed or not

status.description: Indicates the http status corresponding to the individual operation

productName.description: The product name related to this credential

primaryToken.description: The primary token to be used in the next call in the user scope API

secondaryToken.description: The secondary token. Could be usefull if you want to share your access with someone else.

email.description: Your email. We refuse disposable email.

password.description:
The password you want to use for your new account. \
The password length must be greater or equals to 6 and lower or equals to 128. \
The password must contains at least one number and one special character

cultureName.description:
Can be null. Default: en-GB. The culture name you want to use. FYI. \
The email activation will use this culture.

commercialOwnerUserId.description: The user id of your commercial in BeezUP.

externalDocs.description: Find the documentation for BeezUP's API here
